channel.title: Whonix 16.0.3.1 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
channel.description:
# Whonix for VirtualBox
Download Whonix for VirtualBox:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox
----
This is a point release.
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Point_Release
----
# Major Changes
* [use APT `sources.list` `signed-by`](https://forums.whonix.org/t/apt-repository-signing-keys-per-apt-sources-list-signed-by/12302) for Whonix repository * [fixed live mode not booting issue](https://forums.whonix.org/t/bullseye-live-boot-needs-grub-disable-linux-uuid-true-parameter-in-etc-grub-d-11-linux-live/9066) * fixed desktop background images * [fixed policykit](https://forums.whonix.org/t/zulucrypt-appears-blank/12322) * other minor small fixes
----
# Upgrade
Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using [Whonix repository](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Project-APT-Repository).
----
This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!
----
Please Donate!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Donate
----
Please Contribute!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Contribute
----
# Changelog
[https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix_Stable_Release#Whonix_.E2.84.A2_16.0.3.1](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix_Stable_Release#Whonix_.E2.84.A2_16.0.3.1)
----
# Full difference of all changes
https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/16.0.2.7-developers-only...16.0.3.1-developers-only

item.title: Whonix 16.0.3.1 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix for VirtualBox

Download Whonix for VirtualBox:

Whonix – 28 Apr 21

Whonix ™ for Windows, macOS, Linux inside VirtualBox

Whonix ™ for VirtualBox - Stable Version

This is a point release.

Whonix – 24 Apr 21

Point Release

What is a Point Release?

Major Changes

  • use APT sources.list signed-by for Whonix repository
  • fixed live mode not booting issue
  • fixed desktop background images
  • fixed policykit
  • other minor small fixes

Upgrade

Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using Whonix repository.

This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!

Please Donate!

Whonix – 9 Dec 20

Donating to Whonix ™

PayPal, Bitcoin, Monero, Bank Wire

Please Contribute!

Whonix – 31 May 21

Ways to Contribute

Spread, Follow, Develop, Testing, Donate. Contribute to Freedom Software / Open Source.

Changelog

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix_Stable_Release#Whonix_.E2.84.A2_16.0.3.1

Full difference of all changes

https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/16.0.2.7-developers-only...16.0.3.1-developers-only
